root.name: Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers
root.description: Overview Real Bout Fatal Fury 2: The Newcomers (known in Japan as Real Bout Garou Densetsu 2: The Newcomers) is a fighting game developed and published by SNK for the Neo Geo. The game features new graphics (such as backgrounds) and two new characters: Li Xiangfei and Rick Strowd, while reverting the two-plane system of Real Bout Fatal Fury Special back to a modified version of the "oversway" system of Real Bout Fatal Fury (with two planes instead of three). Geese Howard returns as a playable character, with Alfred Airhawk from the PlayStation version of Real Bout Fatal Fury Special entering as a secret boss. The one-line hazard stages from Fatal Fury Special also return. Before two-player matches, players can determine if they want a two-line or one-line stage. The game was also released for the Neo Geo CD and the Fatal Fury Battle Archives Volume 2 compilation for the PlayStation 2. The game was also ported to the Neo Geo Pocket Color under the title Fatal Fury: First Contact. Characters Terry Bogard Andy Bogard Joe Higashi Mai Shiranui Kim Kaphwan Billy Kane Duck King Blue Mary Ryuji Yamazaki Jin Chonshu Jin Chonrei Sokaku Mochizuki Bob Wilson Hon-Fu Franco Bash Tung Fu Rue Cheng Sinzan Laurence Blood Wolfgang Krauser Li Xiangfei Rick Strowd Geese Howard Alfred Airhawk (secret boss, only playable in PS2 version)Lao (only in the versus mode in NGPC version)
